languages.text: "Помнится, ты предлагала напиться, когда мы окажемся в убежище..."
"Didn't you say something about getting sloshed once we were back at the hideout?"
languages.original_text: "Помнится, ты предлагала напиться, когда мы окажемся в убежище..."

traits.locale_text: "Didn't you say something about getting sloshed once we were back at the hideout?"
"Didn't you say something about getting sloshed once we were back at the hideout?"
"Didn't you say something about getting sloshed once we were back at the hideout?"
"Didn't you say something about getting sloshed once we were back at the hideout?"

languages.text: "Wolltet Ihr Euch nach unserer Rückkehr in das Versteck nicht ordentlich betrinken?"
languages.original_text: "Didn't you say something about getting sloshed once we were back at the hideout?"

traits.locale_text: "Wolltet Ihr Euch nach unserer Rückkehr in das Versteck nicht ordentlich betrinken?"

languages.text: « Vous n'aviez pas parlé de prendre une bonne cuite une fois de retour à la cachette ? »
languages.original_text: "Didn't you say something about getting sloshed once we were back at the hideout?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'aviez pas parlé de prendre une bonne cuite une fois de retour à la cachette ? »

languages.text: «¿No habías dicho que cuando volviéramos al escondite nos íbamos a emborrachar?».
languages.original_text: "Didn't you say something about getting sloshed once we were back at the hideout?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No habías dicho que cuando volviéramos al escondite nos íbamos a emborrachar?».

languages.text: “你之前不是说，等咱们回到藏身处之后，你要喝个烂醉如泥吗？”
languages.original_text: "Didn't you say something about getting sloshed once we were back at the hideout?"

traits.locale_text: “你之前不是说，等咱们回到藏身处之后，你要喝个烂醉如泥吗？”

languages.text: 「潜伏場所に戻れば、酒でも飲むって話じゃなかったか？」
languages.original_text: "Didn't you say something about getting sloshed once we were back at the hideout?"

traits.locale_text: 「潜伏場所に戻れば、酒でも飲むって話じゃなかったか？」

languages.text: "Sığınağa dönünce içip içip zom olacağız dememiş miydin?"
languages.original_text: "Didn't you say something about getting sloshed once we were back at the hideout?"

traits.locale_text: "Sığınağa dönünce içip içip zom olacağız gibi bir şey dememiş miydin?"
